item.description:
Join us at Johnny D's for Trivia for Justice. Arrive by yourself or bring your brainy friends!

Look no further if you're seeking like-minded folks to share random trivia with, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while answering picture rounds, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

IMPORTANT DETAILS ABOUT THE VENUE:
The kitchen is closed on Mondays. They serve free pizza (if you order a beverage) and you can also bring in food (really!).

Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the 'Message Board' and are encouraged to suggest and co-host events.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and Event Photos. Learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.
item.name: Trivia for Justice
